member.name: T:ej2_pdfviewer_service.Controllers.PdfViewerController
member.summary: Controlador para manejar la visualización de documentos PDF.

member.name: M:ej2_pdfviewer_service.Controllers.PdfViewerController.#ctor(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IWebHostEnvironment,Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.IMemoryCache)
member.summary: Constructor del controlador PDF Viewer.
member.param: Interfaz del entorno de alojamiento web.

member.name: M:ej2_pdfviewer_service.Controllers.PdfViewerController.Load(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Loads a PDF document into the viewer.
member.param: Dictionary with the key "document" (Base64 or file name).
member.returns: JSON with the details of the loaded document.

member.name: M:ej2_pdfviewer_service.Controllers.PdfViewerController.Unload(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Unloads the PDF document and clears the cache.

member.name: M:ej2_pdfviewer_service.Controllers.PdfViewerController.Download(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Downloads the PDF document as a Base64 string.
member.param: Dictionary with the key "document" (Base64 or file name).
member.returns: Base64 string of the PDF document.
member.remarks: This method is used to download the PDF document as a Base64 string. The document can be either a file name or a Base64 string.

member.name: M:ej2_pdfviewer_service.Controllers.PdfViewerController.PrintImages(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Prints the PDF document and returns the print images.
member.param: Dictionary with the key "document" (Base64 or file name).
member.returns: Base64 string of the print images.
member.remarks: This method is used to print the PDF document. The document can be either a file name or a Base64 string.

member.name: M:ej2_pdfviewer_service.Controllers.PdfViewerController.Bookmarks(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Retrieves the bookmarks of a PDF document.

member.name: M:ej2_pdfviewer_service.Controllers.PdfViewerController.RenderPdfPages(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Renders the pages of a PDF.

member.name: M:ej2_pdfviewer_service.Controllers.PdfViewerController.RenderPdfTexts(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Renders the text of a PDF.
member.remarks: This method is used to render the text of a PDF document. The document can be either a file name or a Base64 string.

member.name: M:ej2_pdfviewer_service.Controllers.PdfViewerController.RenderThumbnailImages(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Retrieves thumbnails of the PDF pages.

member.summary: Retrieves annotation comments from a PDF.

member.summary: Imports annotations from a file.
